site.name: Adalo

children.name: App Editing Backend
children.description: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.
children.descriptionHtml: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

children.name: App Editor
children.description: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.
children.descriptionHtml: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

children.name: App Previewer
children.description: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.
children.descriptionHtml: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

children.name: iOS
children.description: The iOS build server manages the work to package and send your app to Testflight. If this is down, iOS builds may not complete.

children.name: Android
children.description: The Android build server packages your app into an .apk or .aab file so that it can be uploaded directly to the Google Play Store. If this is down Android builds may not complete.

children.name: Stripe
children.description: All Stripe transactions and payments operate through this service. If this is down, Stripe payments may not work in your app.

children.name: Maps
children.description: This service provides the Additional services needed for the Google Maps component to function. If this is down, it may affect pins showing on your maps.

children.name: Notifications
children.description: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.
children.descriptionHtml: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

children.name: Collections
children.description: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.
children.descriptionHtml: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

components.name: App Analytics
components.description: This provides all the data you see in the analytics panel inside the editor. If this is down you won't see any analytics data for your apps.

components.name: Collections API
components.description: This service handles all of your requests to the Collections API. If this is down, your requests to this API will fail.

notices.name: iOS and Android Builds are Failing Due to GitHub

nameTranslation.text_en: iOS and Android Builds are Failing Due to GitHub
nameTranslation.text_es: Las compilaciones de iOS y Android están fallando
nameTranslation.text_ru: Сборки iOS и Android терпят неудачу
nameTranslation.text_zh: iOS 和 Android 构建失败

updates.message: We are happy to announce that the issue with GitHub has been resolved, and builds are now succeeding for both iOS and Android platforms! We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it. You will need to push a new build for the changes to take effect.
updates.messageHtml: We are happy to announce that the issue with GitHub has been resolved, and builds are now succeeding for both iOS and Android platforms! We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it. You will need to push a new build for the changes to take effect.

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en: We are happy to announce that the issue with GitHub has been resolved, and builds are now succeeding for both iOS and Android platforms! We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it. You will need to push a new build for the changes to take effect.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es: ¡Nos complace anunciar que el problema con GitHub se ha resuelto y que las compilaciones ahora funcionan correctamente para las plataformas iOS y Android! Pedimos disculpas por las molestias que esto pueda haber causado y le agradecemos su paciencia mientras trabajábamos para resolverlo. Deberá impulsar una nueva compilación para que los cambios surtan efecto.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru: Мы рады сообщить, что проблема с GitHub была решена, и теперь сборки успешно работают как на платформах iOS, так и на Android! Мы приносим извинения за неудобства, которые это могло вызвать, и благодарим вас за ваше терпение, пока мы работали над ее устранением. Вам нужно будет загрузить новую сборку, чтобы изменения вступили в силу.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh: 我们很高兴地宣布，GitHub 的问题已得到解决，iOS 和 Android 平台的构建现已成功！对于由此造成的不便，我们深表歉意，并感谢您在我们努力解决问题期间的耐心等待。您将需要推送新版本才能使更改生效。

messageTranslation.text_en: We are happy to announce that the issue with GitHub has been resolved, and builds are now succeeding for both iOS and Android platforms! We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve it. You will need to push a new build for the changes to take effect.
messageTranslation.text_es: ¡Nos complace anunciar que el problema con GitHub se ha resuelto y que las compilaciones ahora funcionan correctamente para las plataformas iOS y Android! Pedimos disculpas por las molestias que esto pueda haber causado y le agradecemos su paciencia mientras trabajábamos para resolverlo. Deberá impulsar una nueva compilación para que los cambios surtan efecto.
messageTranslation.text_ru: Мы рады сообщить, что проблема с GitHub была решена, и теперь сборки успешно работают как на платформах iOS, так и на Android! Мы приносим извинения за неудобства, которые это могло вызвать, и благодарим вас за ваше терпение, пока мы работали над ее устранением. Вам нужно будет загрузить новую сборку, чтобы изменения вступили в силу.
messageTranslation.text_zh: 我们很高兴地宣布，GitHub 的问题已得到解决，iOS 和 Android 平台的构建现已成功！对于由此造成的不便，我们深表歉意，并感谢您在我们努力解决问题期间的耐心等待。您将需要推送新版本才能使更改生效。

updates.message: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing builds to fail for both iOS and Android platforms. This is due to an outage with [GitHub](https://www.githubstatus.com/). We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.
updates.messageHtml: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing builds to fail for both iOS and Android platforms. This is due to an outage with GitHub. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing builds to fail for both iOS and Android platforms. This is due to an outage with GitHub. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es: Actualmente estamos experimentando una interrupción, lo que está causando fallas en las compilaciones para las plataformas iOS y Android. Esto se debe a una interrupción con GitHub. Pedimos disculpas por las molestias y proporcionaremos actualizaciones a medida que estén disponibles.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru: В настоящее время мы наблюдаем сбой, который приводит к сбою сборки для платформ iOS и Android. Это связано с сбоем в работе GitHub. Приносим извинения за неудобства и будем предоставлять обновления по мере их появления.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh: 我们目前遇到了中断，这导致 iOS 和 Android 平台的构建都失败。这是由于 GitHub 中断造成的。对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意，并将在有更新时提供更新。

messageTranslation.text_en: We are currently experiencing an outage, which is causing builds to fail for both iOS and Android platforms. This is due to an outage with [GitHub](https://www.githubstatus.com/). We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as they become available.
messageTranslation.text_es: Actualmente estamos experimentando una interrupción, lo que está causando fallas en las compilaciones para las plataformas iOS y Android. Esto se debe a una interrupción con [GitHub](https://www.githubstatus.com/). Pedimos disculpas por las molestias y proporcionaremos actualizaciones a medida que estén disponibles.
messageTranslation.text_ru: В настоящее время мы наблюдаем сбой, который приводит к сбою сборки для платформ iOS и Android. Это связано с сбоем в работе [GitHub] (https://www.githubstatus.com/). Приносим извинения за неудобства и будем предоставлять обновления по мере их появления.
messageTranslation.text_zh: 我们目前遇到了中断，这导致 iOS 和 Android 平台的构建都失败。这是由于 [GitHub](https://www.githubstatus.com/) 中断造成的。对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意，并将在有更新时提供更新。

notices.name: iOS Builds are failing due to Apple Outage

nameTranslation.text_en: iOS Builds are failing due to Apple Outage

updates.message:
There is currently a service interruption with the Apple Developer ID Notary Service causing higher than normal rates of failure on iOS builds. 

We will update here as soon as this is resolved.

We will update here as soon as this is resolved.
